mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gameReview WHERE gnum=#{gnum} ORDER BY grnum DESC
SELECT * FROM gameReview WHERE gnum=#{gnum} ORDER BY grrecommend DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gameReview(grnum, gnum, cid, grlike, grtitle, grcontent, grdate) VALUES(gamereview_num.nextval, #{gnum}, #{cid}, #{grlike}, #{grtitle}, #{grcontent}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE gameReview SET grlike=#{grlike}, grtitle=#{grtitle}, grcontent=#{grcontent} WHERE grnum=#{grnum}
UPDATE gameReview SET grrecommend=grrecommend + 1 WHERE grnum=#{grnum}
